mapper.sql: ID, NUM_NO, REQUIRE_CUST, PROJECT, POSITIONS, REQURE_NUM, REQUEST, PRIORITY, STUTAS, CREAT_TIME
mapper.select:
select DISTINCT(PROJECT) from JBF_REQUIRE_INFO where 1=1
REQUIRE_CUST = #{custName}

select
from JBF_REQUIRE_INFO t WHERE 1=1
AND t.REQUIRE_CUST like '%${requireCust}%'
AND t.PROJECT like '%${project}%'
AND t.POSITIONS like '%${position}%'
AND t.REQURE_NUM = #{requreNum}
mapper.insert: insert into JBF_REQUIRE_INFO (ID, NUM_NO, REQUIRE_CUST, PROJECT, POSITIONS, REQURE_NUM, REQUEST, PRIORITY, STUTAS, CREAT_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requireCust,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requreNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{request,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stutas,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=DATE})

insert into JBF_REQUIRE_INFO
ID,
NUM_NO,
REQUIRE_CUST,
PROJECT,
POSITIONS,
REQURE_NUM,
REQUEST,
PRIORITY,
STUTAS,
CREAT_TIME
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{requireCust,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{requreNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{request,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stutas,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{creatTime,jdbcType=DATE}
mapper.update:
update JBF_REQUIRE_INFO
NUM_NO = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUIRE_CUST = #{requireCust,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT = #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSITIONS = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQURE_NUM = #{requreNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUEST = #{request,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUTAS = #{stutas,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREAT_TIME = #{creatTime,jdbcType=DATE}
where NUM_NO = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update JBF_REQUIRE_INFO set NUM_NO = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUIRE_CUST = #{requireCust,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT = #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITIONS = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQURE_NUM = #{requreNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST = #{request,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUTAS = #{stutas,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREAT_TIME = #{creatTime,jdbcType=DATE} where where NUM_NO = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
